Citation.Name: Forel

Citation.Paragraph:
This is the only species of
Mayriella Mayriella known from Western Australia, and extends the range of this genus in Australia westward by nearly 2,000km. Morphologically this species is most similar to
Mayriella abstinens M. abstinens , a species found along the Queensland and New South Wales coasts (Shattuck and Barnett, 2007
